comments: This contract is a call-up against a Public Works and Government Services Canada procurement tool.This contract includes one or more amendments.This contract is a multi-year contract. Engineering supervisory services to ensure the contractor completes the removal of lead paint on the interior and exterior of the light tower buildings, removal and disposal of lead contaminated soil, and restoration, all as per the plans and specifications; also, the preparation of a closure report for each of the two sites (Gereaux Island and Griffith Island).
